name: Exploding Bees
description:
Exploding Bees is a arcade platform game about a man determined to throw axes at mutant bees. After completing a level by destroying a set number of hives, an endless high score challenge mode becomes available, and the next level also becomes unlocked. There's also a boss and some secrets to discover!

Controls: (Also compatible with Xbox 360 controller)

Left & Right = Move

Up & Down = Adjust aim

X or V = Jump

C = Throw axe

1 = Normal window

2 = Full screen

F2 = Restart

Esc = Pause
